item.title: Remap Capslock to Escape and Ctrl
item.author: Author
item.description: Remap Capslock to Escape and Ctrl In this post I’m gonna be showing you how I remapped capslock to ctrl when you hold it, and esc when you tap it. The need for this comes from people using window managers, or keyboard driven text editors like vim, and emacs or just you use the ctrl key a lot and you hate the weird motion you have to do to get to it.
